pages.text: $(li)The Illusioner are tricky wizards that are armed with a $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bow$(/l).$(br)$(li)Its $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) can inflict Blindness effect, hindering your vision.$(br)$(li)They are able to create illusions of itselft, at this moment, the Illusioner is completely immune to any kind of attack.
$(li)The Illusioner can only be found in a $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raid$(/l).
